name: Summer Fun Video Loop
desc: A seven-second loop for the UMHB video wall. An existing Photoshop composition was exported to After Effects and animated with various effects.

name: Retro Candy Ad
desc: A fake television advertisment for the fictional Sweet Street candy store. The video was played back off of a genuine VHS tape to create an authentic retro look.

name: Crunch Time
desc: A dynamic motion graphic created to advertise a new sports field

name: Dolphin TV
desc: A retro MTV / Liquid Television TV bumper for the fictional Dolphin TV network

name: Miss MHB Bumper
desc: A video / animation hybrid for the 60s-themed Miss MHB competition
